title: EZChain Bridge (AB) FAQ
description: The EZChain Bridge (AB) can be used to transfer ERC20 tokens from Ethereum to EZChain's C-Chain and vice versa. This document answers common questions about the bridge.

frontMatter.description: The EZChain Bridge (AB) can be used to transfer ERC20 tokens from Ethereum to EZChain's C-Chain and vice versa. This document answers common questions about the bridge.
